name: Nyanco
description:
Welcome to Nyanco! In this adventure, you control Nyanco that has a bomb installed in her heart. Now you must find your way out, or just wait for your life to be quiet forever. (ฅ'ω'ฅ)

Features

  • Various comics and anime parodies (/≧▽≦)/
  • 3 Endings (Bad, Happy, and Another Endings)
  • The strange tricks filled with interesting twists
  • Of Nyanco, By Nyanco, For Nyanco.ヽ(=^･ω･^=)丿
  • Recommended for ADV Lovers, Otaku and Live Streamers!

Hint

Though some tricks seem to have no clue, you will be able to find a way eventually.ヽ(=´▽`=)ﾉ

Special Thanks

Alice, nashix, glow, Endark, Schematist, 肥皂泡, ParanoX, Rainbow Uncle, HaZE, and you!
